VALID UNTIL 0155Z
FL GA
FROM 30WNW AMG-40SSE AMG-40NW CTY-10NW TLH-30WNW AMG
AREA SEV TS MOV FROM 27030KT. TOPS ABV FL450.
HAIL TO 1 IN...WIND GUSTS TO 50KT POSS.
OUTLOOK VALID 250155-250555
AREA 1...FROM 30ENE BUF-SIE-CRG-110S CEW-50SSE TTH-30ENE BUF
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM
